Accueil - Jungle lab

Photography experiment_ Jungle Lab

This project was born from a personal desire to experiment on Adobe Lightroom C during quarantine. I decided to work on plants photography, that i've taken all over the places where i've gone, between Canarias and France. I modified the colors so as to give the impression of a bioluminescent jungle.

You can find the integrality of my work on my Behance : @justinemgy

2020

Category : PHOTOGRAPHY
